plot: HITLER OF THE ANDES, identifies declassified documents in the FBI archives that reveal for the first time the American authorities' belief that Hitler did not die in his Berlin bunker, but escaped to Argentina.
title: Hitler of the Andes
plot_es: HITLER OF THE ANDES, identifies declassified documents in the FBI archives that reveal for the first time the American authorities' belief that Hitler did not die in his Berlin bunker, but escaped to Argentina.
plot_en: HITLER OF THE ANDES, identifies declassified documents in the FBI archives that reveal for the first time the American authorities' belief that Hitler did not die in his Berlin bunker, but escaped to Argentina.
